description: This file defines a custom web component 'todo-list' for managing and displaying a list of todo items, including methods for adding, removing, toggling, and updating items and styles.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: A custom HTML element extending HTMLElement to manage a list of todo items with various update and toggle functionalities.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new TodoItem to the list based on the provided entry object.

methods.name: addItems
methods.description: Adds multiple todo items from an array of entries.

methods.name: removeCompletedItems
methods.description: Removes all todo items marked as completed.

methods.name: toggleItems
methods.description: Toggles the completion state of all items based on the 'completed' parameter.

methods.name: updateStyles
methods.description: Updates the display style of the list based on the total items.

methods.name: updateView
methods.description: Updates the visibility of an individual item based on the current route filter.

methods.name: updateElements
methods.description: Updates the list of elements based on the specified action type and id.

methods.name: updateRoute
methods.description: Sets the current route and updates the view accordingly.

methods.name: attributeChangedCallback
methods.description: Handles changes to observed attributes, updating styles if necessary.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Lifecycle method called when the element is added to the DOM; initializes styles.
